post.title: Episode 19 - What Does The NSA Say?
post.description: In this episode we discuss a recent NSA advisory regarding best practices for intercepting TLS traffic.  We also take a look at a recent DOM Clobbering (XSS) finding, several VNC exploits, and end with a discussion on fuzzer performance and hardening against power-analysis side channels.
post.content:
You can watch the DAY[0] podcast live on Twitch (@dayzerosec) every Monday afternoon at 12:00pm PST (3:00pm EST)

Our past episodes are available on the following platforms

  • Youtube (@DAY[0])
